title: How to download Android 13 for Google Pixel and other Android devices
content:
Get ready to dig into Android 13! The next major release of Google’s OS is now available in the form of Developer Preview. For lucky owners of the Google Pixel 6, Pixel 6 Pro, Pixel 5a, Pixel 5, Pixel 4a 5G, Pixel 4a, Pixel 4, or Pixel 4 XL, youâ€™ll be among the first users

The post How to download Android 13 for Google Pixel and other Android devices appeared first on XDA.
description: Google has officially kicked off the Android 13 Developer Preview program. You can download the release right now and give it a try!
